translation: Some hurry into Your mouths with their terrible teeth, fearful to behold. Some are found stuck in the gaps between the teeth, their heads crushed to powder.
commentary: 11.27 Faces mouths? And Thy? Hurrying hurrying? enter enter? fangs terribletoothed? Terrible fearful to behold? Some some? Sticking apart? in the gaps between the teeth? appear to be are found? crushed to powder? uttamaṅgaiḥ with (their) heads.Commentary How do they enter into the mouth Arjuna continues
